script.text: Hello Heather, I am preparing the material for the Marketing event next week. However I still need your part of the presentation, can you please share it with me?
Hi Frank, Are you looking for the presentation of the new product? I am afraid, I can’t share right now. I am still working on it.

Heather, can you please finish the presentation as soon as possible.  We need to consolidate all the slide decks tonight. Can you please share the new product image now? I need to follow up the creation of the whitepapers with the Marketing team.
Sure, here are the product images that I have.
By the way, here is a draft of my presentation.
Lucille, I am worried about the Pricing Plan. Are you ready to present the Pricing Strategy tomorrow in our Executiving meeting?
Hi Frank. Yes, I am finishing the details. I still need some information from the Sales Manager team. Let me see what I can share now.
Thanks! Appreciate that! The Pricing Strategy Meeting tomorrow is a go no-go moment for the launch of our product.
You're welcome. I'll let you know when I have I have final version asap. In the meanwhile, take a look at this: [link](http://workspace.ibm.com)
Hi Lucille, let me invite someone from the Sales Team to join our conversation. They have all the details that you need.
